reviews.review: Buen juego, pero muchos cheaters y actualizaciones importantes escazas, 1 año hay que esperar practicamente.
Toxic ash but I love the game
Wenn man mit den Sprays zurecht kommt ist eigt ganz nice
Good game, but a lot of children who have nothing to do there. Lots of fun servers both from surfing and after 1in1, I recommend buying PRIME status for a better enjoyment of the game without cheats
Funny russian toxic kids, worth the laugh every now and again

CS: GO – это логическое продолжение CS 1.6 и Source. Разработчики объединили всё лучшее, доработали геймплей и добавили игру в Steam. Новая реалистичная графика и детализированные карты позволяют каждому пользователю полностью погрузиться в атмосферу противостояния.
Very fun and addicting game lots of rage too

While playing there might be a couple times when you get griefing players. Except those cases its a fun enough game.
Although, its very fun when you are playing with your friends.

Edit after 2k hours: Good game perhaps.
игра тупарылая помойка не играйте в неё
Kocham grać w tom gre zmarnowałem kilka dni życia na darcie sie na rusków polecam i nie polecam tych z ktorymi grałem
Its fun to play and it even better when you play with friends

CS:GO. Le jeux parle de lui même, c'est tout simplement un chef d'oeuvre. Vous n'avez qu'à l'essayer et vous verrez. Vous en tomberez amoureux.
o jogo eh bom mas tem muito xitado

used to really love this game. it has an intensity which any other game lacks. however it now rigged with hackers and the devs have done so little to bring a stop to it. i feel really bad to stop playing this game but as of right now this game is unplayable . hope they will make some improvements so that it becomes clean and future players can actually enjoy how beautiful this game is.
signing off, a veteran of 2686 hours. so long boys.
